channel.title: Posing models - Problem with rotation
channel.description:
http://rapidshare.com/files/256696233/poserBETA.zip Always scan - http://www.kaspersky.com/scanforvirus
Run, load model, then load animation. Select the 1st item from the 3rd dropdown list (rotation), should be labeled '3'. Now drag the Y-axis slider bar to rotate the model. This is where you see the problem, the legs and arms twist but not around the Y-axis center.
What is causing this? You only need the program to figure it out, not the code...
BTW, it's not finished, no crash checks, and it will crash alot if you don't select things in the right order. Lots of crap to link in yet.
Have fun.
